parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sides

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Pre-defined variable for the civilian [[Side|side]].

<br>When used in a [[format]] statement (<tt>hint [[format]]["%1",civilian]</tt>), the string returned is <tt>"CIV"</tt>.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''civilian'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Side]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> SQS:<code>?((side _unit) == [[civilian]]) : [[hint]] "This is a civilian unit!"</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> SQF:<code>[[if]] (([[side]] _unit) == [[civilian]]) [[then]] {
    [[hint]] "This is a civilian unit!";
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[side]], [[west]], [[east]], [[resistance]], [[sideEmpty]], [[sideAmbientLife]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">
<dt class="note">[[User:Ceeeb|Ceeeb]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
In '''OFP v1.96''', empty vehicles, objects and dead soldiers are on side civilian.


<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>



[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.99|CIVILIAN]]
[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.96|CIVILIAN]]
[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.46|CIVILIAN]]

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on May 1, 2018 - 15:03 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:KC Grimes|KC Grimes]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
In '''Arma 3 v1.82''', units where [[setCaptive]] and/or [[setUnconscious]] are set to true are on side civilian, regardless of low rating (Renegade status).
</dd>
</dl>
